SUMA DEL CUADRADO DE UNA MATRIZ Y SU INVERSA (Parte 1)

Sea: [imath] A=\left[\begin{array}{ll}{1} & {-5} \\ {3} & {-1}\end{array}\right] \quad \begin{array}{l}{\text { and } 0} \\ {\text { hare }} \\ {\text { sher }}\end{array} [/imath]\nHallar: [imath] A^{2}+A^{-1} [/imath]\nParte 1[imath]{1} & {-5} [/imath] [imath] {3} & {-1}[/imath]
